name: Rush Plane: Fly Race Simulator
description:
Drive your plane through dangerous space and jungle to become a highly skilled flight pilot.
Use an accelerated storm to help you outperform other opponents and become the first pilot to reach the finish line.
Earn as much cash as possible to get a more cool plane.

Game features:
- Up to 13 domineering aircraft for you to drive
- Excellent control experience
- 4 thrilling and beautiful scenes for you to experience
- Endless levels for you to challenge
